product_name: REI Nikole Day Bag - Women's - 2013 Special Buy
long_description: The REI Nikole day bag boasts a convertible design that goes from a mini backpack to a sling pack, so you're ready for any occasion. Main body of bag is made from 100% recycled PET; each bag keeps 28 16-oz. plastic bottles out of landfills! Post-consumer recycled PET polyester is tough enough to endure the daily grind. Shoulder strap design allows use as a single sling or 2-strap backpack-simply unclip a strap and tuck it away to convert to a sling style. Zippered panel opening on main compartment opens wide to access items such as magazines, books and files; interior padded pocket holds e-book reader or small netbook. Front pocket features a panel organizer to stow your daily essentials such as wallet, MP3 player, change, keys and pens. Zippered front pocket includes a key fob and small pockets for must-have items. Back panel features a zippered vertical pocket; inside is a smaller pocket for your passport. Zip-away side pocket is sized for a water bottle; side slip pocket can keep a small umbrella within reach. Air mesh padding on back panel and shoulder straps controls moisture by wicking perspiration away from your body for cool carrying comfort. Special buy.
